trans-unit.source: Controls run-time behavior of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> associated with an operation.
trans-unit.target: Styr beteendet för körning av den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>som är associerade med en åtgärd.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSerializerOperationBehavior enables control of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: XmlSerializerOperationBehavior aktiverar kontroll av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>Alternativ, till exempel <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A>egenskapen i <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"></xref> class with a specific operation.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"> </xref> klass med en specifik åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> to export or serialize.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior"> </xref> klass.

An <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> used to hold SOAP use and format options.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>används för att hålla SOAP-användning och formatera alternativ.</xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of mappings between XML schema elements and CLR data types.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar mängden mappningar mellan schemaelement för XML- och CLR-datatyper.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>s that contains the mappings.
Adds a set of parameters to an operation description.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en uppsättning parametrar till en beskrivning av åtgärden.

trans-unit.target: Lägger till en uppsättning parametrar till en beskrivning av åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: The target <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription>.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection> that contains the parameters.
Applies a client's behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: Gäller en klient beteendet för åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: Applies a client's behavior to the operation.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> that represents the operation.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation> that represents a client operation.
Applies a dispatch behavior to the operation.
Applies a dispatch behavior to the operation.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation> to apply.
